title: Does editing 4k raw justify 32GB of memory? - Quora

response.answer_text: Id say yes. It will in addition it may justify the latest processor/CPU tech, a really capable graphics card and a minimum of 500 GB SSD hard drive. Perhaps you will be best served with a 40–48 inch 4k monitor on thunderbolt / dp / minidp ver. 1.2 or more, and a minimum of 60 hz refresh rate on both screen and graphics card. More often than not they only manage 30 hz, witch sucks bad. Seems like moderne HDMI 2.0 capability on both monitor and screencard or the new USB connectors cope 4k 60 hz out of the box, but I would not beat on it.
